snippet: Kevin Rudd, who ousted Australia’s first female prime minister last week in a party coup, dismissed speculation that he was pandering to women.
abstract: Prime Min Kevin Rudd, who supplanted Australia’s first female prime minister Julia Gillard in a party coup, announces a new cabinet that includes more women than any other in country’s history.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Rudd, who ousted Australia’s first female prime minister last week in a party coup, dismissed speculation that he was pandering to women.

headline.main: Australian Leader Announces Cabinet With Record Number of Women
headline.print_headline: New Cabinet Includes a Record Number of Women
